option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/DEV/JAVA/KODNEST/servlets/student-project/backend/StudentApp":"{\"/src/main/java/com/example/HelloServlet.java\":\"This file contains a single Java class, `HelloServlet`, which extends the `HttpServlet` class from the Jakarta Servlet API.\\n\\n`HelloServlet`: This class is a servlet that responds to HTTP requests with the message \\\"Hello World!\\\".\\n\\n`service(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)`: This method is overridden from the `HttpServlet` class and is responsible for handling the incoming HTTP request and generating the response.\"}"}
